dict.string: User shared content (of any type).
User shared video content.
User shared animated gif content.
User shared a video created with more engagement by the user. The user added audio or played around with the advanced video settings before sharing.
User shared using facebook messenger.
User copied to clipboard using the keyboard extension.
The user opened the keyboard.
The user opened the recorder for a retake and finished the recorder flow succesfully (onboarding excluded).
The user opened the recorder for a retake and finished the recorder flow succesfully with good background (onboarding excluded).
The user finished successfully the recorder onboarding.
The user finished successfully the recorder onboarding and the take was with good background mark.
The user browsed content and seen at least 20 rendered emus.
The user browsed content and seen at least 50 rendered emus.
The user browsed content and seen at least 75% of all emus.
The user browsed content and seen at least 75% of all emus.
<Bool> - Is the user allowed to tweak some extra options in video files rendering? (number of loops, ping pong effect etc)
Bool
<Bool> - Is the user allowed to render emus as videos?
Bool
<Bool> - Is the user allowed to render emus as videos with audio?
Bool
<String> - The name of the icon used for the retake button in the top navigation bar.
retakeIcon
String
<String> - A list of preffered emus oids to use for preview in the onboarding stage (given as a comma delimited string)
String
<Int> - Number of seconds to countdown from before starting to record (if 0 will not count down and start recording immediately)
Number
<Bool> - Boolean value indicating if the advanced camera options are shown to the user when the recorder is opened for the first time for onboarding.
Bool
<String> - The subject text for the email sent when the user select to share app link using email.
Emu - Selfie Stickers
String
<String> - The body text for the email sent when the user select to share app link using email.

Hi

Check out this cool app:

Emu - Selfie Stickers
https://geo.itunes.apple.com/app/id969789079?mt=8&uo=6
String
<String> - The body html for the email sent when the user select to share app link using email.
String
<Number> - 0 - Normal. 1 - New behavior with bg detection sync changes. (number of loops, ping pong effect etc)
Number
